modName: Teach Followers Spells Through Spell Tomes
summary: Allows you to teach spells to followers by giving them spell tomes.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff7700][size=5]Description:[/size][/color]
[size=3]Allows you to teach spells to followers by giving them spell tomes. Once taught, you can have followers forget spells by giving them the spell tome again.[/size]


[/font][size=3]How to teach a spell to a follower:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Talk to a follower and select the Give Spell Tome option.[/size]
[*][size=3]Select the Teach spell option.[/size]
[*][size=3]Give the follower a spell tome and they will learn the spell if they don't already know it.[/size]
[*][size=3]The spell tome will be "destroyed" when the follower learns the spell.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
How to make a follower forget a spell:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Talk to a follower and select the Give Spell Tome option.[/size]
[*][size=3]Select the Forget spell option.[/size]
[*][size=3]Give the follower a spell tome and they will forget the spell if they already know it.[/size]
[*][size=3]The spell tome will NOT be "destroyed" when the follower forgets the spell, and will be returned to the player.[/size]
[/list]


[color=#ff7700][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=3]Skyrim.esm[/size]
[*][size=3]Update.esm[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]﻿[/size]
[*][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url]﻿ (For Full Version)[/size]
[/list]


[color=#ff7700][size=5]Versions:[/size][/color]
[size=3]Full:[/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]Includes a MCM that allows you to see which spells you have taught to a follower through spell tomes.[/size]
[*][size=3]To view the learned spells, simply move your in-game crosshair over a follower then go to the MCM and view the list of spells they've learned.[/size]
[/list][size=3]Light:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Does NOT include a MCM. You will have to remember the spells you taught to each follower.[/size]
[/list]


[color=#ff7700][size=5]Questions:[/size][/color]
[size=3]Q: Will this work with spells from mods?
A: Yes.

Q: Does this conflict with other mods?
A: No. No original records were altered. This mod is compatible with everything.

Q: Do I have to have SKSE?
A: Yes. The mod will not work without it.

Q: I taught spells to a follower but they won't use them. Why?
A: There are several reasons why.
[/size][list=1]
[*][size=3]Your follower doesn't have enough magicka to cast the spell.[/size]
[*][size=3]Your follower doesn't have high enough skill in that school of magic to cast the spell. (Example: Followers need a skill of 50 in destruction to cast Fireball)[/size]
[*][size=3]The AI of your follower doesn't see the spell as useful in combat.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
Q: Will this work for custom followers or followers that don't use the normal follower system?
A: Yes, it should.

Q: Why does the option appear for NPCs that temporarily follow me during certain quests?
A: So the option appears for followers that don't use the normal follower system. There's not much I can do to avoid this.
[/size]
